q: The jury ______ divided in their opinions.
This is the only one of his stories that ______ worth reading.
Two third of the town ______ in ruins.
The long and the short of the matter ______ this.
A list of weak boys in our school ______ published.
Three parts of the business ______ in my hands.
Every inch of the field ______ searched.
None of the thieves ______ been arrested.
There ______ an egg on the plate.
Manoj, the tallest of all the students in our class, ______ clever.
